group_1.textRight: Okay, that concludes your enhancement.

group_1.textLeft: Thanks, Mitama!
Mm...what's up?

group_1.textRight: Um...I'm sorry, it's just that I@saw some of your wild fantasies...
I probably shouldn't even bring the topic up,
but could you perhaps indulge my curiosity...?

group_1.textLeft: Ehâ€•?!@Ah, um...sure?

group_1.textRight: Aimi...@Are you a wedding chapel kind of girl?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
That's the kind of fantasy I was having just now?!@Ooooh, I'm so embarrassed!

group_1.textRight: I am sorry, okay?@It's not like I was trying to see it.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I mean, I do long for a wedding dress.
But lately I've been thinking that wearing a@traditional white kimono might be nice...
If I did that, would the wedding be at a shrine or@someplace else with a Japanese-style...? *Giggle*
Well...before that...comes the confession...

Ah, you two are a bit late, don't you think?@[chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_0][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_050.exp3.json][chara:302301:motion_400][chara:302301:lipSynch_1]...Wait, you're not looking too keen, are you?

group_1.textCenter: On the way here...a lot happened...

group_1.textRight: Oh my...! Wedding photo models?
And being photographed by the sea,@how romantic is that~?
Getting scouted out like that,@you two are so lucky!

group_1.textLeft: Mmmm...

group_1.textRight: ...Huh? You don't seem thrilled?

group_1.textLeft: It's not that I'm not, but...@It's just...complicated...
You know, my parents already broke@up once before, so I'm kiiind of torn.

group_1.textRight: Ah, I get it...
Then why didn't you turn down the scout?

group_1.textLeft: ...The photographer who asked@us was incredibly insistent.
When you get told that there isn't anyone@else in the world who can pull it off,
it makes it hard to say no...

group_1.textRight: So that's what happened...
But that just goes to show how@perfect you two are for modeling!
Yeah, yeah!@That's amazing, isn't it?!

group_1.textLeft: I-is it...? Then I guess I should be happy...

group_1.textRight: Plus you get free wedding photos, don't you?
Won't it leave you two with@some wonderful memories?

group_1.textLeft: ...It is certainly a rare opportunity.@She may have a point.

group_1.textRight: Yeah... Yeah, you're right.
Alright, since we've accepted this responsibility,@why don't we go all out!
Then you two need to start by feeling@like you're really getting married!

group_1.textLeft: That we're getting married?

group_1.textRight: That's right... Two people who love each other@becoming united...that's what marriage is...!
If it were my wedding, I'd love a chapel@or somewhere with a Japanese feeling,
but a seaside marriage is wonderful too...!

group_1.textCenter: Do you swear to love one another@in sickness and in health?

group_1.textRight: Yes, I swear.

group_1.textLeft: ...M-me too...! I swear!

group_1.textCenter: Now, seal your vows with a kiss...

group_1.textRight: Aimi...

group_1.textLeft: Hayato...
Aimiii!@AAAIIIMIII!

group_1.textRight: [chara:302301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Whaâ€•?!
Ahaha, sorry about that.@My daydreams just got the better of me...
*Giggle*@Though, she is right.
Marriage does sound somewhat romantic,@doesn't it?

group_1.textLeft: Romantic...

group_1.textRight: Since we're all here,@maybe if we have some girl talk,
it could give you a good reference@for your wedding shoot.

group_1.textLeft: ...Is that how that works?

group_1.textRight: [chara:302301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Alright, let's go girl talk~!
